summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.content: Front-end Developer with over 2 years of experience specializing in large-scale financial trading platforms and e-commerce applications. Hands-on experience working on systems for leading securities companies (VPS, ACB) and high-performance admin dashboards. Proficient in the React ecosystem (Next.js, Redux) with a strong mindset toward performance optimization, real-time data handling, and backend integration (Node.js).

jobs.project: Web Trading Platform for VPS Securities
jobs.description: Core team member developing Vietnam’s largest securities trading platform, ensuring real-time stability and high performance.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained critical financial modules: Fund Transfer, OTP Authentication, Profit/Loss Reports, and Portfolio Management.
Built real-time Market Data and Price Board features using Socket.io.
Optimized UI/UX performance using React.memo, useMemo, and list virtualization techniques (react-window).
Implemented multi-language support (i18next) and robust form validation with Yup.
Collaborated closely with Backend and QA teams following Agile and Git flow processes.
jobs.tech_stack: ReactJS, Redux Toolkit, Redux-Saga, TailwindCSS, Socket.io, Radix UI

jobs.description: Developed an internal admin system to standardize company operational and management processes.
responsibilities: Designed intuitive dashboards and implemented role-based access control (RBAC) for data security.
Improved system maintainability and scalability through modular architecture and reusable components.
Integrated with Spring Boot backend to manage product and service modules.

jobs.description: Developed a multi-vendor e-commerce platform with full online payment and order tracking features.
responsibilities: Built core user flows: Home page, Product details, Cart, and Checkout.
Managed complex global state (Cart, Wishlist, Orders) using Redux Toolkit and Saga.
Optimized SEO and page load performance with Next.js (ISR/SSR) and lazy loading.
Developed an Admin Dashboard with sales analytics charts and real-time order tracking.
jobs.tech_stack: Next.js, ReactJS, Redux, TailwindCSS, TypeScript, NestJS, Cloudinary

jobs.description: Built dashboards for tracking spending, investments, and portfolio performance with real-time analytics.
responsibilities: Visualized complex financial data using interactive charts with Chart.js.
Synchronized real-time data via WebSocket and optimized API data flows.
Implemented Light/Dark mode and multi-language support to enhance user experience.
